remark.ch: 外系欲選修此課程的同學，需修過兩學期普通化學與上學期有機化學，並請向廖康廩老師取得密碼卡

content.en:
Chapter 12 Organohalides: Nucleophilic Substitutions and Eliminations
Chapter 13 Alcohols, Phenols, and Thiols; Ethers and Sulfides
Chapter 14 Aldehydes and Ketones: Nucleophilic Addition Reactions
Chapter 15 Carboxylic Acids and Nitriles
Chapter 16 Carboxylic Acid Derivatives: Nucleophilic Acyl Substitution Reactions
Chapter 17 Carbonyl Alpha-Substitution and Condensation Reactions
Chapter 18 Amines and Heterocycles
Chapter 10 Structure Determination: Mass Spectrometry, Infrared Spectroscopy, and Ultraviolet Spectroscopy
Chapter 11 Structure Determination: Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy

grading.en: Roll call 10％ Quizzes 9％ Midterm Exam 1 30％ Midterm Exam 2 33％ Final Exam 33％
grading.ch: 點名 10％ 小考 9％ 期中考 1 30％ 期中考 2 33％ 期末考 33％
